description: Options used to configure a Headless server. Read in from a JSON file on Headless start.

Schema.description: JSONSchema for this file, used for external users to validate and test this file.

Comment.description: An optional free form comment for this file. Used for identification for your configuration.

UniverseID.description: Optionally, specifies which universe this Headless Server will be in. See <see href="https://wiki.resonite.com/Universes">our wiki article on Universes</see> for more info.

TickRate.description: Configures how many ticks(updates), should occur per second. Default is 60.

MaxConcurrentAssetTransfers.description: Specifies the maximum concurrent asset transfers for this headless server. Default is 4.

UsernameOverride.description: Configures a username which will override <see cref="P:FrooxEngine.Headless.HeadlessConfig.LoginCredential" />, within the world browser etc.

LoginCredential.description: Username for this Headless Server to use.

LoginPassword.description: User password for the Headless Server to use.

items.description: A list of worlds/sessions to start/create when this Headless Server starts.
items.title: WorldStartupParameters

StartWorlds.description: A list of worlds/sessions to start/create when this Headless Server starts.

DataFolder.description: Optionally, override the folder which will be used to store data for this Headless Server.

CacheFolder.description: Optionally, override the folder which will be used to store cache for this Headless Server.

LogsFolder.description: Optionally, override the folder which will be used to store logs for this Headless Server.

items.description: A list of hosts which will automatically be allowed for HTTP/WebSocket operations

AllowedUrlHosts.description: A list of hosts which will automatically be allowed for HTTP/WebSocket operations

items.description: A list of item URIs to spawn in when a world starts.

AutoSpawnItems.description: A list of item URIs to spawn in when a world starts.

title: HeadlessConfig

boolean.description: When set to false, this will disable this world entry from starting.

string.description: The name of the session as shown in the World/Session Browser

string1.description: An optional custom session id for this session.

string2.description: An optional description of this session, displayed within the world/session browser.

integer.description: The maximum number of users, allowed to join this session.

sessionAccessLevel.description: The Access Level for this session please see <see cref="T:SkyFrost.Base.SessionAccessLevel" /> for more information.
sessionAccessLevel.title: SessionAccessLevel

boolean1.description: Determines whether custom join verifier should be enabled in this session

nullableOfBoolean.description: Determines if this session should be hidden from the world/session browser or not.

items.description: A list of tags, to assist with searching or discovering sessions.

listOfString.description: A list of tags, to assist with searching or discovering sessions.

boolean2.description: Determines if this session is friendly for mobile/quest users.

string3.description: When provided with a world URL this will load this world for the session.

string4.description: When provided and valid, this will load the specified world preset into the session.

recordId.description: Overrides the world id for this session allowing it to be grouped and displayed with other sessions with this world id.
recordId.title: RecordId

nullableOfUInt16.description: Optional, If specified it will force this session to run on a specific network port.

boolean3.description: Optional, If specified will keep the original roles as saved in the world.

dictionaryOfStringAndString.description: When provided with a list of username and permission pairs it will grant those users the listed permissions when they join.

string5.description: An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine the role of this user. See our wiki article for more information.

string6.description: An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine if this user is allowed in the session. See our wiki article for more information.

string7.description: An optional name of a cloud variable to use to determine if this user is denied access to the session. See our wiki article for more information.

string8.description:
The name of a cloud variable whose value will be used, When a user is denied access by <see cref="P:SkyFrost.Base.WorldStartupParameters.RequiredUserJoinCloudVariable" /> this message will be displayed to them if present.
See <see href="https://wiki.resonite.com/Cloud_Variables">our wiki article</see> for more information.

number.description: Configures the number of minutes that a user can be away(shelled out) from a world before they are kicked. Setting this to -1 disables this option.

items.description: Provides a list of Parent Session Ids for this session. See <see href="https://wiki.resonite.com/Cloud_Variables">our wiki for more info</see>.

listOfString1.description: Provides a list of Parent Session Ids for this session. See <see href="https://wiki.resonite.com/Cloud_Variables">our wiki for more info</see>.

items.description: Users within this list will automatically be invited to this world when it starts.

listOfString2.description: Users within this list will automatically be invited to this world when it starts.

string9.description: An automatic message sent to the users on the <see cref="P:SkyFrost.Base.WorldStartupParameters.AutoInviteUsernames" /> list along with their invite.

nullableOfSaveAsOwner.title: SaveAsOwner
nullableOfSaveAsOwner.description: Controls who saves this world when it is saved. See, <see cref="P:SkyFrost.Base.WorldStartupParameters.SaveAsOwner" /> for more information.

number1.description:
If this is set(>0) and the world is empty, it will restart regularly using the value to determine the number of seconds between restarts.
Headless only

number2.description:
If this is set(>0), it will restart regularly using the value to determine the number of seconds between restarts.
Headless only

boolean5.description: If set to true will save this world on exit.

number3.description:
If this is set(>0), it will automatically save using the value to determine the number of seconds between saves.
Headless only

boolean6.description:
If set to true, will prevent an empty(or filled with away users) world from running a full update cycle regularily.
Headless only

boolean7.description: When set to true, will wait for an active Resonite User session before loading this auto-start world.
